markdown:
'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [location](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{poe2}}.

## Background

This elegant mansion is the home and office of [Governor Clario](/governorClario/), head of the Vailian administration at [Port Maje](/portMaje/).

## Points of interest

* There are four rooms in each corner of the estate: The kitchen, dining room, bedroom, and study (from top right, clockwise). They contain only minor loot.

## Characters

* [Governor Clario](/governorClario/)
* [Loisa](/loisa/), the governor's wife.

## Gallery

<gallery mode=nolines widths=200px>
PE2_Governor_Clario's_Estate_Exterior.png | Building exterior
</gallery>

==Background==
This elegant mansion is the home and office of [[Governor Clario]], head of the Vailian administration at [[Port Maje]].
